What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. pair a creature with Soulbond with another creature
2. on stack, kill the other creature
3. play another creature What is the expected output? What do you see instead? when I play the third creature I should be able to pair it with the creature with Soulbond still in play. The ability does not trigger, and the Soulbond is active (I had an unpairable Elgaud Shieldmate with Hexproof in play) What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.39 on win 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). LOG (P): Tap Tundra. Tap Sunpetal Grove. Tap Tropical Island. title: Soulbond ability does not reset

comments.body:
Thanks, I am able to replicate this bug with your clear description. Working on a fix, problem is the engine does not check if a permanent is on the battlefield when it pairs them up.

**Status:** Accepted
